title: (x) "Beasty Boys" 1970s decorative geometric sans - Sinaloa {Stephen}
content:
Can you please help me identify this funky title? Thanks!!  
Andi

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [beastie\_boys.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018024324/http:/typophile.com/files/beastie_boys.jpg) | 19.81 KB |
author: andi emery

comments.content:
Off the top of my head, I recall a face called 'Sinola' or such.  
Not near my type specimens at the moment.

Thanks Norbert, I'll check it out (Hope things are going well with you!!)

Andi

These digitizations of [Sinaloa](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018024324/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&startrow=1&records=100&currpage=1&totalrecords=2&searchby=&searchID=&searchletter=&searchstr=sinaloa&font_categories_checkbox=font_name_search&fontRendererText=BEASTIE+BOYS) are very close.

\>_‘Sinola’_?!  
Thanks, Stephen... at least I haven't lost **_all_** my brain cells (just most of them)!  
Are you planning a Beastie Boys reunion poster, Andi?
Norbert, I think you were thinking of [Shinola](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018024324/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shinola).

Yikes!  
Then what did I shine my shoes with?
